Python Module Index

a | c | g | m | p | r
 
a
animation Classes and functions that support timed multiple-image Spriting (animation).
 
c
camera Represents the perspective of the player in the gameworld.
collision Mechanics and behaviors of GameObjects during and after collisions
component Includes various classes that are core to the game but do not fit in any other modules.
 
g
gameobject Models every object that has a presence or position in worldspace
 
m
map Handles reading and organizing level and tile data
 
p
player The player character
playercontroller Handles input that directly controls the player character in game.
 
r
render Functions involving the drawing of objects to the screen.
